error.postcode_no_matches: No addresses were found with the given postcode. Please check the format of the postcode and try again.
error.property_selector_no_matches: No addresses starting with the given property selector were found.
error.property_selector_multiple_matches: Multiple addresses starting with the given property selector were found.
error.property_selector_unknown: An unknown error occurred whilst attempting to match addresses.
error.api_refuse_unknown: An unknown error occurred whilst fetching the refuse collection dates.
error.api_unavailable: The Amber Valley Borough Council API is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

abort.api_unavailable: The Amber Valley Borough Council API is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
